RTAI schedulers modules

Detailed Description

RTAI schedulers.

The functions described here are provided for :

  • uniprocessor (UP) scheduler;
  • symmetric multi processors (SMP) scheduler;
  • multi uni processors (MUP) scheduler.
For more details, see the the overview of RTAI schedulers.


Modules

Mailbox functions
Message handling functions
Remote procedure call functions
Semaphore functions
Task functions
Timer functions
